name: Digital Gift Card
sizes: 2 Reviews, SORT BY
description: Not sure what to choose? Our digital gift card is the perfect option. Delivered straight to their inbox, it lets them shop their favourite pieces whenever they like — for birthdays, thank yous or just because. Available in values from £10 to £200 Delivered to the recipient’s inbox for immediate gifting Redeemable online only Expires after one year, giving them plenty of time to choose what they love Edits after purchasing will not be possible, so please double check the recipient's details For further information, please see the FAQs.

name: Men's Everyday Boxer Briefs
description: Comfortable elastic waistband that won't dig or slip. Double-layered pouch for gentle yet secure support. Lightweight design that won't ride up. Form fitting with plenty of room to stretch. Minimal silhouette for unrestricted comfort. Please note that this product has recently undergone a name change and was formerly known as the Men's Everyday Boxers.

name: Sport Ankle Socks
description: Introducing Boody's Sport Ankle Bamboo Socks in Black for Men & Women. Made comfy with Viscose fibre made from organically grown Bamboo. Arch compression for added support. No irritating toe seam for ultimate comfort. Breathable mesh panel wicks away moisture. Ankle tab keeps the sock up and creates a barrier against rubbing shoes. Comfortable yet tighter fit to reduce friction at your pressure points. Reinforced toe and heel for durability and longevity. Please note that our socks have recently undergone a name change. This is to better reflect their fit. These were previously named the Sports Socks.
